channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Note Press
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Note Press

item.title: CVE-2022-1690|2024-08-03T00:10:03.752Z -- unknown -- note%20press
item.description: The Note Press WordPress plugin through 0.1.10 does not sanitise and escape the ids from the bulk actions before using them in a SQL statement in an admin page, leading to an SQL injection

item.title: CVE-2022-1688|2024-08-03T00:10:03.815Z -- unknown -- note%20press
item.description: The Note Press WordPress plugin through 0.1.10 does not sanitise and escape the id parameter before using it in various SQL statement via the admin dashboard, leading to SQL Injections

item.title: CVE-2022-1689|2024-08-03T00:10:03.847Z -- unknown -- note%20press
item.description: The Note Press WordPress plugin through 0.1.10 does not sanitise and escape the Update parameter before using it in a SQL statement when updating a note via the admin dashboard, leading to an SQL injection
